com.google.appengine.tools.mapreduce

Interface ShardContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MapOnlyMapperContext<O>, MapperContext<K,V>, ReducerContext<O>, WorkerContext<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseShardContext, MergeContext, SortContext

    public interface ShardContext
extends Context
    Context for each shard.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Counter getCounter(String name)
      Returns the Counter with the given name.
      Counters getCounters()
      Returns a Counters object for doing simple aggregate calculations.
      int getShardCount()
      Returns the total number of shards.
      int getShardNumber()
      Returns the number of this mapper or reducer shard (zero-based).
      void incrementCounter(String name)
      Increments the Counter with the given name by 1.
      void incrementCounter(String name, long delta)
      Increments the Counter with the given name by delta.
